name: Duralumin Wind (itch)
description:
Duralumin Wind is a straight forward 2d twin stick shooter in which you pilot a helicopter with limited ammunition, health and fuel. Each of these resources will need to be replenished as you play by finding pickups scattered across the level.

Each of the four levels are composed of series of individual objectives that must be completed to clear the level. Accessing your map and mission objective screen will help you navigate between points on the map.

Their is no saving mid level, instead the game automatically unlocks the next level upon the completion of the current level and saves your progress.

Currently the game only supports keyboard and mouse controls.

Developer's Note
I'm a self taught game developer and this is my first commercial release. I would appreciate any feedback, if you have issues with the game contact me. I will do my best to get back to you with help.

Thank you for taking the time to check out this game, and I hope you find it enjoyable.
Francisco Arias - CETVE LLC
